sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section is a candidate for merging with List of applications.** This article or section is a candidate for merging with List of applications.

This article or section is a candidate for merging with List of applications.

A few starting packages for hacking the Wii on Arch Linux. Also see Wiibrew.org for a guide to getting homebrew setup on the Wii.

sections.title: Native Coding
sections.content:
- wiiloadAUR lets you upload games to the Homebrew Channel
- wit - tools to manipulate Wii and GameCube ISO images

sections.title: Wiimote
sections.content: - cwiidAUR - a library in C for working with the Wii Remote.

sections.title: Emulation
sections.content:
- dolphin-emu - the dominant emulator for the Wii (also supports Gamecube).
- dolphin-emu-gitAUR - development version
- decaf-emu-gitAUR - An experimental open-source Nintendo Wii U emulator
